name.en: Special topics of organic device simulation

goal.en: For students to understand the physical mechanisms of various organic electronic devices
goal.ch: 使學生了解各種有機光電元件的物理機制

content.en:
1. Simulation of conduction mechanism in organic transistors
2. Simulation of conduction mechanism in organic light-emitting diodes
3. Simulation of luminescence mechanism in organic light-emitting diodes
4. Simulation of luminescence mechanism in organic lasers
content.ch:
1. 模擬有機電晶體的導電機制
2. 模擬有機發光二極體的導電機制
3. 模擬有機發光二極體的發光機制
4. 模擬有機雷射的發光機制

grading.en:
期中作業 : 50％
期末作業 : 50％

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance

ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現
口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 出席/課堂表現

en: Department:MSc in  Optics and Photonics、Institute of Lighting and Display Science、MSc in Optical Sciences in-service、PhD in Optics and Photonics only.
ch: 系所:限光電科學與工程學系碩士班、光電科學與工程學系照明與顯示科技碩士班、光電科學與工程學系碩士在職專班、光電科學與工程學系博士班。
